long_description: The Comp Floor Pump from Planet Bike features super-tough composite construction with a large base for stable pumping. Anatomic Love Handle(TM) lets you pump air comfortably. Features an improved gauge system over previous generation. Dual head fits both Presta and Schrader valves. Needle and cone adapters included for pumping up sport balls. Rebuildable.
short_description: The Comp Floor Pump from Planet Bike features super-tough composite construction with a large base for stable pumping.
